attributes.title: prAna's Fair Trade Certified apparel partners
attributes.description: To learn more about the people and places that made prAna's Fair Trade shirts, click on each of the stops along the way.

attributes.title: Step 10 prAna
attributes.name: prAna
attributes.description: From prAna's warehouse our Fair Trade certified shirts are shipped to our customers. Sustainability Fact: Consistent with the brand’s mission to offer products with “purpose,” prAna offers some of the first Fair Trade Certified products available in the USA.
attributes.vimeo:title: prAna
attributes.block:about sustainability: Consistent with the brand’s mission to offer products with “purpose,” prAna offers some of the first Fair Trade Certified products available in the USA.

attributes.title: Step 9 Port of Los Angeles
attributes.name: Arrives in the USA - Port of Los Angeles
attributes.address: 425 South Palos Verdes Street, San Pedro, CA 90731
attributes.description: Once our shirts arrive in Los Angeles they are sent to prAna's warehouse in Vista, CA.

attributes.title: Step 8 Port of Kolkata
attributes.name: Shipping - Port of Kolkata
attributes.description: Port of Kolkata - From this port prAns' shirts are shipped via boat to the Los Angeles port.

attributes.title: Step 7 Rajlakshmi Cotton Mills
attributes.name: Graphic Printing - The Rajlakshmi Cotton Mills Pvt. Ltd
attributes.description: Rajlakshmi also does screen printing and at this stage the graphics are added to prAna's shirts. Sustainability Fact: Rajlakshmi has had a long standing commitment to Organic and Fair Trade. This has become the fundamental principles of the business and its practices
attributes.block:about sustainability: Rajlakshmi has had a long standing commitment to Organic and Fair Trade. This has become the fundamental principles of the business and its practices

attributes.title: Step 6 Rajlakshmi Cotton Mills
attributes.name: Garment Sewing - The Rajlakshmi Cotton Mills Pvt. Ltd.
attributes.description: Rajlakshmi is one of the first factories certified for Fair Trade USA's Fair Trade Apparel and Linen's pilot. At this stage of production our shirts are sewn. Sustainability Fact: Rajlakshmi is one of the first factories piloting the Fair Trade USA Apparel and Linens Pilot offering Fair Trade certified products to the USA market.
attributes.block:about sustainability: Rajlakshmi is one of the first factories piloting the Fair Trade USA Apparel and Linens Pilot offering Fair Trade certified products to the USA market.

attributes.title: Step 5 Mahadex Fabrics
attributes.name: Fabric Finishing - Mahadex Fabrics
attributes.description: Mahadex Fabrics, a division of N.M. Export, is a dyeing and processing unit in West Bengal, India. It is here that prAna's Fair Trade fabric is finished. Sustainability Fact: Mahadex has invested in state of the art technology to reduce the environmental impact of waste, water and air pollution in the dyeing and finishing process.
attributes.block:about sustainability: Mahadex has invested in state of the art technology to reduce the environmental impact of waste, water and air pollution in the dyeing and finishing process.

attributes.title: Step 4 Rupa & CO. Ltd.
attributes.name: Fabric Dyeing - Rupa & CO. Ltd.
attributes.description: Rupa & Co. is a dyeing and processing plant in West Bengal, Indian. Here our Fair Trade shirts are dyed. Sustainability Fact: An aspect to Rupa's mission is to promote the latest R & D and utmost environmentally-friendly production processes.
attributes.block:about sustainability: An aspect to Rupa's mission is to promote the latest R & D and utmost environmentally-friendly production processes.

attributes.title: Step 3 Rajlakshmi Cotton Mills
attributes.name: Fabric Knitting - The Rajlakshmi Cotton Mills Pvt. Ltd.
attributes.description: Rajlakshmi is the Indian manufacturer and exporter of organic and Fair Trade textile products. At this stage in production the yarns are knit into fabric. Sustainability Fact: Rajlakshmi has had a long standing commitment to Organic and Fair Trade. This has become the fundamental principles of the business and its practices
attributes.block:about sustainability: Rajlakshmi has had a long standing commitment to Organic and Fair Trade. This has become the fundamental principles of the business and its practices

attributes.title: Step 2 Maral Overseas Ltd
attributes.name: Yarn Spinner - Maral Overseas Ltd
attributes.description: Maral Overseas Ltd. is one of India's largest vertically integrated textile companies. The Fair Trade, Organic cotton fibers are spun into yarns here for prAna's Fair Trade shirts. Sustainability Fact: Maral Overseas is deeply commitment to both social welfare of workers and the community, but the environment in their operations.
attributes.block:about sustainability: Maral Overseas is deeply commitment to both social welfare of workers and the community, but the environment in their operations.

attributes.title: Step 1 Chetna Organic Agriculture
attributes.name: Cotton production - Chetna Organic Agriculture Producer Co Ltd
attributes.description: COAPCL is a group of farmers producing organic and fair trade cotton. The farmers are located in Odissa, Maharastra, and Andra Pradesh India. Sustainability Fact: Chetna Organic is a belief of more than 8000 predominantly tribal farmers in the practices of sustainable agriculture and ethical trade.
attributes.block:about sustainability: Chetna Organic is a belief of more than 8000 predominantly tribal farmers in the practices of sustainable agriculture and ethical trade.

attributes.title: Step 1 Chetna Organic Agriculture  to Step 8 Port of Kolkata
attributes.name: Road
attributes.description: From Chetna Organic Agriculture in Secunderabad, India, to the Port of Kolkata by truck.

attributes.title: Step 2 Maral Overseas Ltd to Step 8 Port of Kolkata
attributes.name: Road
attributes.description: From Maral Overseas in Khargone, India, to the Port of Kolkata by truck.

attributes.title: Step 3 Rajlakshmi Cotton Mills to Step 8 Port of Kolkata
attributes.name: Road
attributes.description: From The Rajlakshmi Cotton Mills in Kolkata, India, to the Port of Kolkata by truck.

attributes.title: Step 4 Rupa & CO. Ltd. to Step 8 Port of Kolkata
attributes.name: Road
attributes.description: From Rupa & CO in Howrah, West Bengal, India, to the Port of Kolkata by truck.

attributes.title: Step 5 Mahadex Fabrics to Step 8 Port of Kolkata
attributes.name: Road
attributes.description: From Mahadex Fabrics in Howrah, West Bengal, India, to the Port of Kolkata by truck.

attributes.title: Step 6 Rajlakshmi Cotton Mills to Step 8 Port of Kolkata
attributes.name: Road
attributes.description: From The Rajlakshmi Cotton Mills in Kolkata, India, to the Port of Kolkata by truck.

attributes.title: Step 7 Rajlakshmi Cotton Mills to Step 8 Port of Kolkata
attributes.name: Road
attributes.description: From The Rajlakshmi Cotton Mills in Kolkata, India, to the Port of Kolkata by truck.

attributes.title: Step 8 Port of Kolkata to Step 9 Port of Los Angeles
attributes.name: Sea
attributes.description: The items travel from Kolkata, India, to the Port of Los Angeles.

attributes.title: Step 9 Port of Los Angeles to Step 10 prAna
attributes.name: Road
attributes.description: Once they reach the Port of Los Angeles the items go to prAna's warehouse.
